articles.title: I had little hope of reaching home alive: Tumakuru girl
articles.description: “I had little hope of reaching home alive and meeting my parents again,” said a relieved Nandini AC who reached her Arakere home in Tumakuru district from war-torn Ukraine on Monday. She is a second-semester MBBS student of Kharkiv National Medical University.
